# Feature: Integration of Gemini AI for Audience Analysis

## User Request

Complete Gemini AI integration for audience analysis

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Implement Gemini AI client in the backend
- [ ] Create a service to analyze audience data using Gemini
- [ ] Endpoint to trigger analysis and retrieve results
- [ ] Store analysis results in the database
- [ ] Handle API errors and rate limits gracefully

## Technical Approach

Use Google's Generative AI SDK. Connect to the Audience data model to fetch demographics/interests, then prompt Gemini for insights.

## Files Expected to Change

- packages/testing.spike.land/src/ai/gemini.ts
- src/services/audience-analysis.ts
- src/app/api/audience/analyze/route.ts

## Out of Scope

- Real-time chat with the audience
- Fine-tuning models
